Source code for PyCard.core.resource

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
from card import hand
import utility
import predef
__author__ = 'Ecialo'



[docs]class Resource(utility.Component):

    categories = [predef.RESOURCE]


[docs]    def set(self, value):
        pass



[docs]    def clear(self):
        pass




[docs]class FlagResource(Resource):

    def __init__(
            self,
            is_active=False
    ):
        super(FlagResource, self).__init__()
        self._active = is_active


[docs]    def set(self, value):
        self._active = value



[docs]    def clear(self):
        self._active = False




[docs]class AmountResource(Resource):

    def __init__(
            self,
            amount=0
    ):
        super(AmountResource, self).__init__()
        self._amount = amount


[docs]    def change(self, value=1):
        self._amount += value



[docs]    def set(self, value):
        self._amount = value



[docs]    def clear(self):
        self.set(0)




[docs]class TagResource(Resource):

    def __init__(
            self,
            tag=None
    ):
        super(TagResource, self).__init__()
        self._tag = tag


[docs]    def set(self, value):
        self._tag = value




[docs]class ParameterResource(Resource):
    pass




[docs]class HandResource(Resource, hand.Hand):

    categories = [predef.RESOURCE, predef.HAND]
    name = "hand"
